tags.name: See
tags.description: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1634127 Delete the record attachment downloaded locally. This is the counterpart of `downloadToDisk()`. Use `deleteDownloaded()` if `download()` was used to retrieve the attachment. No-op if the related file does not exist.

source.source: * @deprecated See https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1634127
